lyrics:
6 contributorssmokin out lyricschorus project pat
smokin out like chief wahoo hoo

roll up a blunt like light up the green

soon as the thunder enters my lungsah

crackers and cheese zuzus and whams
icy white honey bun ooohh there i am

turn up a 45 drankin and chokin

so full of dope smoke comin out my ears
burnt fingernails aint made no sales

to hell with that fool go an take a pull
we cheefin all night and we stay gettin food

chorus project pat
smokin out like chief wahoo hoo
chase it down with the liquor and brew brew

somebody get this dope cause im through through
you might also likeverse 2 lord infamous

ay what drug would lord be he be
yo lord would be a pound of weed
but no stems no sticks no seeds
its just because i believeah in cannabis sativa
in my lungs i keep the sticky greenah
puffahontas puff a peace pipe ridin on my peetah

i keepah uh the l the o the r the d
i be on the bl the unt
i brew a cup of shrooms and break down the bag ah
purple kush pretty bush cheech n chong in meah
im the scarecrow me in the ville protecting acres
smoke it out the bong a swisher leaf yes even papers

chorus project pat
